attributes.action: Offer scholarships to all students of Palestine
attributes.additional_details: It is the Government / Parliament who can implement this.
attributes.background: To offer students living in all areas of Palestine, including Gaza... Scholarships in the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like school or university scholarships to be offered. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
